channel.title: CVE Feed for OISF -- libhtp
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OISF -- libhtp

item.title: CVE-2024-23837|2024-08-12T14:57:03.079Z -- oisf -- libhtp
item.description: LibHTP is a security-aware parser for the HTTP protocol. Crafted traffic can cause excessive processing time of HTTP headers, leading to denial of service. This issue is addressed in 0.5.46.

item.title: CVE-2024-28871|2024-04-04T14:46:02.803Z -- oisf -- libhtp
item.description: LibHTP is a security-aware parser for the HTTP protocol and the related bits and pieces. Version 0.5.46 may parse malformed request traffic, leading to excessive CPU usage. Version 0.5.47 contains a patch for the issue. No known workarounds are available.

item.title: CVE-2024-23837|2024-02-26T16:17:24.372Z -- oisf -- libhtp
item.description: LibHTP is a security-aware parser for the HTTP protocol. Crafted traffic can cause excessive processing time of HTTP headers, leading to denial of service. This issue is addressed in 0.5.46.

item.description: LibHTP is a security-aware parser for the HTTP protocol and the related bits and pieces. Version 0.5.46 may parse malformed request traffic, leading to excessive CPU usage. Version 0.5.47 contains a patch for the issue. No known workarounds are available.
